enable-bonding.help: Enable bonding. Only applicable if the device is connectable

io-capabilities.help: Specify the IO capabilities of the device. Valid values are IO_CAPS_DISPLAY_ONLY, IO_CAPS_DISPLAY_YESNO, IO_CAPS_KEYBOARD_ONLY, IO_CAPS_NONE, and IO_CAPS_KEYBOARD_DISPLAY

enable-signing.help: Enable generating and distributing signing keys during pairing
